TopicTitle: Sun isn't properly occluded by clouds

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: i7-10870H | GPU: RTX 3070 | RAM: 16GB

 

The visuals for the sun doesn't seem to be blocked by clouds, while flying above/at the level of the clouds at sunset. Not sure exactly what's causing it but it's a bit jarring to see the glare when irl the sun would be hidden behind the clouds.

 

Video attached shows sun not being hidden by clouds. It does get hidden by the horizon while I was flying near to the cloud layer to get a better look but as you can see the glare shows up through the clouds regardless.
